body_html:
I did not see the usual NV driver initialization routine here, so I suspect a misconfiguration of your NV driver. Debian testing is also not officially supported by NV.

Typically I would suggest switching to Ubuntu 16.04/18.04, but you could also do a fresh installation of your NV driver. If the issue remains there, please post your installation method and the log.

body:
I did not see the usual NV driver initialization routine here, so I suspect a misconfiguration of your NV driver. Debian testing is also not officially supported by NV. 

Typically I would suggest switching to Ubuntu 16.04/18.04, but you could also do a fresh installation of your NV driver. If the issue remains there, please post your installation method and the log.
